Input files.Flight_lines_COMMENT: Select a flight lines file or layer. '.shp' and '.kml' are accepted
Input files.Elevation_Data_Raster_COMMENT: This is usually SRTM data. Get the SRTM downloader Plugin. Usually '.hgt' or '.tif'.

Settings.analysis_resolution_meters_COMMENT: FlightLines will be broken up into sections of this distance upon which the slope calculation will be done.
Settings.slope_percent_threshold_COMMENT: If the slope is steeper than this threshold it will be considered to be 'steep' and colored red.

Output options.output_kml_lines_where_steep_COMMENT: If checked, a '.kml' file will be made (next to the input lines) that shows where the steep bits are
Output options.output_shp_lines_where_steep_COMMENT: If checked, a shapefile'.shp' file will be made (next to the input lines) that shows where the steep bits are
Output options.output_analysis_result_data_to_excel_COM: If checked, am excel spreadsheet file will be made (next to the input lines) with data.
